title: Burberry confuses Riz Ahmed for Dev Patel because ‘all brown people look the same?’ | hollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Burberry confuses Riz Ahmed for Dev Patel because ‘all brown people look the same?’ 
British fashion label Burberry confused Riz Ahmed for Dev Patel in a tweet congratulating him for his win at Sunday’s BAFTAs, and the internet didn’t take it easy. hollywood Updated: Feb 14, 2017 08:13 IST Hindustan Times Dev Patel won a BAFTA for his performance in Lion.(Twitter) 
British fashion label Burberry was happy for Dev Patel for winning the BAFTA for Best Supporting Actor. They even put out a tweet congratulating Patel. But unfortunately for everyone involved, the image they attached to the tweet was not of Dev Patel, but Star Wars Rogue One star Riz Ahmed. 
The tweet was soon deleted, but the Internet is permanent. Several Twitter users grabbed screenshots of the goof-up, some even suggesting that this mistake hinted at underlying racism. Do “all brown people look the same?” asked Twitter user Simran Jeet Singh. Burberry just confused @RizMC for Dev Patel because all brown people look the same? This is why we need to diversify our media. pic.twitter.com/d4iIITHNdo
